opinion.case_name: Schriro, Director, Arizona Department of Corrections v. Summerlin

opinion:
541 U.S. 933

SCHRIRO, DIRECTOR, ARIZONA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS
v.
SUMMERLIN.

No. 03-526.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 22, 2004.

1

[Certiorari granted, 540 U. S. 1045.] Motion of the Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument granted.
